# Scorch (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (a red dragonâ€™s scale)

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** 30-ft. line

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 181

*A jet of roaring flame bursts from your outstretched hand, scorching any creature in its path.*

*Scorch* deals 1d8 points of damage per two caster levels, to a maximum of 5d8 points of damage, to each target it hits.
